title: Sunscape Battlemage
text: Kicker  and/or  (You may pay an additional  and/or  as you cast this spell.)When Sunscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its  kicker, destroy target creature with flying.When Sunscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its  kicker, draw two cards.
expansion: Duel Decks: Phyrexia vs. the Coalition
